mapper.select: SELECT pr.pass_review_id, pr.title, pr.created_date_time, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pass_review_note prn WHERE prn.pass_review_id = pr.pass_review_id AND prn.note_type = 'DOCUMENT' AND prn.deleted_date_time IS NOT NULL) AS documentNoteCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pass_review_note prn2 WHERE prn2.pass_review_id = pr.pass_review_id AND prn2.note_type = 'INTERVIEW' AND prn2.deleted_date_time IS NOT NULL) AS interviewNoteCount FROM pass_review pr WHERE pr.club_id = #{clubId} ORDER BY pr.created_date_time DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}
